[[Image:Coat of arms of Canada.svg|right|thumb|200px|The Court of Appeal of Alberta uses the Royal Arms of Canada to represent the Queen of Canada as the font of justice.]]
 
The '''Court of Appeal of Alberta''' (frequently referred to as '''Alberta Court of Appeal''' or '''ACA''') is an [[Court_system_of_Canada#Appellate_courts_of_the_provinces_and_territories|Canadian appellate court]].
The '''Court of Appeal of Alberta''' (frequently referred to as '''Alberta Court of Appeal''' or '''ACA''') is an [[Court_system_of_Canada#Appellate_courts_of_the_provinces_and_territories|Canadian appellate court]].
